content: निवासः {@--1@} Living, dwelling, residing. {@--2@} A house; abode, habitation, resting-place; निवासश्चिंतायाः <ls>Mk. 1. 15</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 63</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">5. 21</ls>; <ls>Bg. 9. 18</ls>; <ls>Mk. 3. 23.</ls> {@--3@} Passing the night. {@--4@} A dress, garment. {@--5@} Nightquarters. {@--6@} Refuge, receptacle, asylum; जगन्निवासो वसुदेवसद्मनि <ls>Śi. 1. 1.</ls>
